devdoc.details: The contract has an owner address, and provides basic authorization control whitch simplifies the implementation of user permissions. This contract is based on the source code at https://goo.gl/n2ZGVt.

constructor.details: The constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender account.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.
